sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';

import { Box, Text, Anchor } from 'grommet';

const ListItem = ({ item, removeItem }) => {
  return (
    <Box 
      background="accent-4" 
      align="center"
      round="small" 
      height="27%" 
      width="85%" 
      justify="around"
    >
      <Box>
        <Text textAlign="center" margin={{bottom: "xsmall"}} weight="bold">{item.name}</Text>
        <Box direction="row" justify="center" gap="medium" width="100%">
          <Text size="small">{item.categories[0].title}</Text>
          <Text size="small">{(item.distance / 1000).toFixed(1)} kms</Text>
        </Box>
      </Box>
      <Box direction="row" justify="center" gap="xlarge" width="100%">
          <Box background={{ "color": "dark-1", "opacity": "strong"}}>
            <Anchor color="dark-1" size="small" href={item.url} primary label="Info" />
          </Box>
          <Box>
            <Anchor color="dark-1" size="small" onClick={() => removeItem()} label="Delete" />
          </Box>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default ListItem;
